    (package private) boolean Game.botAttack​(int player, Position pos)
    Given a Player and a Position, this method is in charge to tell the bot whether it attacked succesfully or not and if he was, makes the player receive the shot with everything that conveys.

    Checks if a shot at a certain Position would hit a Ship making use of Fleet.checkShot(Position).
